page.title: 10HORNSEA SCHOOL GAMES - SLAP
page.content:
This game is played by{two}humans. The game is where two people sit down in any place. The two people place their hands on their opponent's{chin.
Then they{stare}at each other in the face and take it turns to tell{jokes, a funny{jest}or{stare.
The{aim}is to make your opponent {laugh.}Then he will be{struck}with the palm of the hand of the human that kept a straight face.
It does{not}mean a{hard slap,}just a soft hit across the face.If the opponent becomes{frightened}and{runs you{win.
Benjamin Tonks
